name: titanically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is extremely powerful, strong, important, or large: My father was a titanically energetic and ambitious man. Later in the month, the volcano erupted titanically and sent a vast cloud of rocks and ashes down the mountainside.
More examplesFewer examplesEvery so often he would surprise us all by doing something that was titanically stupid.This titanically sized volume contains all of her published poems.He made his name in the titanically popular television series "Friends".
